assessments.status_rationale: No bullet reports ICE Brent front-month settling at or above $100/bbl; the deadline is 2026-09-30, so the event may still occur later.
No item references TrendForce/DRAMeXchange server DRAM contract-price data or a ≥15% QoQ increase; deadline is 2026-09-30.
Today’s bullets do not mention BLS CPI-U for 'computers, peripherals, and smart home assistant devices' turning positive YoY; deadline is 2026-12-31.
No bullet indicates DHS/USCIS issued a Federal Register NPRM expanding mandatory E-Verify beyond current federal-contractor requirements; deadline is 2026-12-31.
No bullet reports a DOJ Antitrust Division or FTC settlement/consent agreement ending an active federal antitrust lawsuit against a major tech platform; deadline is 2026-12-31.
No bullet references South Korea’s PIPC issuing a ≥KRW 50 billion administrative fine/penalty against Coupang tied to the reported data breach; deadline is 2026-12-31.

While several bullets concern Colombia/Venezuela-related incidents and U.S. pressure in the region, none clearly state a public U.S. announcement of a pause/suspension/reduction of ≥$50 million in security/counternarcotics assistance to Colombia; deadline is 2026-06-30.
No bullet indicates the EU Council adopted a new Syria-related restrictive-measures package designating ≥10 individuals/entities in a single action; deadline is 2026-06-30.

No bullet mentions McDonald’s, Yum!, RBI, Wendy’s, or Chipotle stating (in an earnings call/press release/SEC filing) that a national value platform will continue through at least 2026-12-31; deadline is 2026-09-30.
